item.title: LISA, what's spatial lag?
item.description: In the last tutorial we went over the concept of spatial autocorrelation and Moran’s I.

item.title: Spatial Autocorrelation in R
item.description: Overview Tobler’s first law of geography states that “everything is related to everything else, but near things are more related than distant things.
